title: Pf2e Crowdsourced Community Corrections
description: Patches pf2e compendium documents to fix community-reported errors, as 'unofficial errata'.

pf2e-ccc-patched.label: (CCC patched)
pf2e-ccc-patched.description: (This was permanently altered by the Pf2e Crowdsourced Community Corrections module.  To revert this alteration you'll need to update or reinstall your pf2e system.)
